job_details.Functieomschrijving: The Linux team is continuously improving the current infrastructure landscape by automation and the use of new technologies. Besides ensuring excellent operations your activities will support the team in building and expanding (new) systems and platforms, enhancing existing infrastructure, the infra delivery to our internal customers, and carrying out life cycle management of systems and software., You will be part of the Cloud & Infrastructure Solutions team. This team of around 30 people is located in two locations. For this role working in either location (The Hague or Diemen) is possible. Together with your direct colleagues you will be responsible for managing several external suppliers responsible for infrastructure on the supply side and work with Delivery & contract managers, Product Owners and Project managers and the demand side.
job_details.full_text:
Linux Engineer

The Linux team is continuously improving the current infrastructure landscape by automation and the use of new technologies. Besides ensuring excellent operations your activities will support the team in building and expanding (new) systems and platforms, enhancing existing infrastructure, the infra delivery to our internal customers, and carrying out life cycle management of systems and software., You will be part of the Cloud & Infrastructure Solutions team. This team of around 30 people is located in two locations. For this role working in either location (The Hague or Diemen) is possible. Together with your direct colleagues you will be responsible for managing several external suppliers responsible for infrastructure on the supply side and work with Delivery & contract managers, Product Owners and Project managers and the demand side.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on Linux infrastructure management, automation, and system operations. It does not mention any specific AI, machine learning, or generative AI technologies, models, or frameworks. The role appears to be traditional infrastructure engineering rather than an AI-focused technical role.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'ensuring excellent operations' directly relates to maintaining and managing systems in a production environment, which is a core aspect of Operations Engineering.
The mention of 'building and expanding (new) systems and platforms' and 'enhancing existing infrastructure' aligns with software development activities related to infrastructure.
job_tasks.phrase: building and expanding (new) systems and platforms

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'enhancing existing infrastructure' points to development and improvement of current systems, which falls under software development in an infrastructure context.
The phrase 'infra delivery to our internal customers' implies developing and providing infrastructure services, which involves software development principles for delivery.
job_tasks.phrase: infra delivery to our internal customers

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'carrying out life cycle management of systems and software' is a key responsibility in operations engineering, covering the entire lifespan of IT assets.
job_tasks.phrase: carrying out life cycle management of systems and software

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions working with 'Delivery & contract managers, Product Owners and Project managers' and managing 'external suppliers', indicating a need to understand business context and collaborate with various stakeholders.
job_tasks.phrase: work with Delivery & contract managers, Product Owners and Project managers

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'managing several external suppliers' implies understanding business relationships and operational requirements related to external services.

soft_skills.phrase: work with Delivery & contract managers, Product Owners and Project managers
managing several external suppliers responsible for infrastructure on the supply side and work with Delivery & contract managers, Product Owners and Project managers and the demand side
